statistic.title: Place distribution by types
statistic.sql: select ca_l_i.item_value as "place type", count(*) as "number" from ca_places ca_p left join ca_list_items ca_l_i on ca_p.type_id=ca_l_i.item_id and ca_l_i.parent_id is not null left join ca_lists ca_l on ca_l.list_id=ca_l_i.list_id where ca_p.deleted=0 group by ca_l_i.item_id order by 2 desc

statistic.title: Place creation by month this year
statistic.sql: SELECT year(FROM_UNIXTIME(cal.log_datetime)) AS year, monthname(FROM_UNIXTIME(cal.log_datetime)) as month, concat(count(DISTINCT logged_row_id)) as creation FROM `ca_change_log` cal where cal.logged_table_num=72 and changetype="I" and year(NOW()) = year(FROM_UNIXTIME(cal.log_datetime)) GROUP BY year,month ORDER BY year,month(FROM_UNIXTIME(cal.log_datetime))

statistic.title: Place creation by month last year
statistic.sql: SELECT year(FROM_UNIXTIME(cal.log_datetime)) AS year, monthname(FROM_UNIXTIME(cal.log_datetime)) as month, concat(count(DISTINCT logged_row_id)) as creation FROM `ca_change_log` cal where cal.logged_table_num=72 and changetype="I" and year(NOW()) - 1 = year(FROM_UNIXTIME(cal.log_datetime)) GROUP BY year,month ORDER BY year,month(FROM_UNIXTIME(cal.log_datetime))

statistic.title: Places by status
statistic.sql: SELECT ca_li.idno as Status, count(ca_p.place_id) as Number FROM ca_places ca_p LEFT JOIN ca_list_items ca_li ON ca_li.item_value = ca_p.status LEFT JOIN ca_lists ca_l ON ca_li.list_id=ca_l.list_id WHERE ca_l.list_code='workflow_statuses' and ca_li.item_value!="Root" and ca_p.deleted=0 group by ca_li.item_value

statistic.title: Places by access
statistic.sql: SELECT ca_li.idno as Access, count(ca_p.place_id) as Number FROM ca_places ca_p LEFT JOIN ca_list_items ca_li ON ca_li.item_value = ca_p.access LEFT JOIN ca_lists ca_l ON ca_li.list_id=ca_l.list_id WHERE ca_l.list_code='access_statuses' and ca_li.item_value!="Root" and ca_p.deleted=0 group by ca_li.item_value

statistic.title: Deleted places
statistic.sql: SELECT IF(deleted>0,"yes","no") as "Deleted", count(place_id) as Number FROM ca_places GROUP BY deleted
